org.jasig.cas.web.support

Class DefaultCasCookieValueManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.cas.web.support.DefaultCasCookieValueManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CookieValueManager

    @Component(value="defaultCookieValueManager")
public final class DefaultCasCookieValueManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements CookieValueManager
    The DefaultCasCookieValueManager is responsible creating the CAS SSO sookie and encrypting and signing its value.
    Since:
    4.1
